message: Let's be fair, I'll take a bit more
My turn to propose a fairer split. This offer leaves us both with a good amount.
Come on, Bob! Meet me in the middle!
Okay Alice, let's split the difference a bit more this time.  This offer is a good compromise.
Getting closer, Bob! Don't let inflation eat away your share!
Alice, let's stop wasting time. A 50/50 split is the fairest and ensures we both benefit before inflation eats further into my share.
